title: Test Pilot
name: testpilot-addon
description: Test Pilot is a privacy-sensitive user research program focused on getting new features into Firefox faster.
author: Mozilla (https://mozilla.org/)

scripts.bundle: cd ..; npm run addon:locales; cd addon/src; cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack; cd ..;
scripts.start: npm run bundle && jpm post --post-url http://127.0.0.1:8888
scripts.package: npm run bundle && jpm xpi && mv testpilot-addon.xpi addon.xpi && mv @testpilot-addon-$npm_package_version.update.rdf update.rdf
scripts.package-win: npm run bundle && jpm xpi && move testpilot-addon.xpi addon.xpi && move @testpilot-addon-%npm_package_version%.update.rdf update.rdf
scripts.sign: cd .. && npm run addon:locales && cd addon && npm run bundle && ./bin/update-version && ./bin/sign
scripts.slow-test: npm run lint && flow --quiet && cross-env NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha --reporter min
scripts.coverage: flow-coverage-report -i 'src/lib/**/*.js' -t html -o coverage/flow && npm run slow-test
